query.SQL: select id, forename, surname, /* The function below converts an SQLite date into the number of milliseconds since 1 Jan 1970 so the jdbc driver can retrieve it as a proper date object */ strftime('%d/%m/%Y', birthday) birthday, gender from people /* The ifnull function substitutes the wildcard character if forename is not provided */ where lower(forename) like ifnull(lower(?),'%')||'%' and lower(surname) like lower(?)||'%' and strftime('%d/%m/%Y', birthday) like '%'||ifnull(?,'%')||'%' order by surname, birthday /* Return at most 20 rows */ limit 20

select id, forename, surname, /* The function below converts an SQLite date into the number of milliseconds since 1 Jan 1970 so the jdbc driver can retrieve it as a proper date object */ strftime('%d/%m/%Y', birthday) birthday, gender from people where id = ?
